idea-plugin.name: GetX Template Generator
idea-plugin.description:
Tools support generate getx template file, only work on Flutter project

How to use?

  • Step 1: Open your Flutter project
  • Step 2: Right click on any file or folder in your project structure (or select File) -> New -> GetX Generator
  • Enter name you want to create
  • Click OK
  • Wait a few moment, don't hurry
  • All done!
